sense.def:
To commit suicide
pomeni vzeti si življenje.

seg.quote: The founder of British India, Clive, committed suicide in 1774.
...a worsening crisis of neglect, suicide, and crime.

sense.def:
To commit suicide
pomeni tudi namerno narediti nekaj, kar nam uniči poklicno napredovanje ali položaj v družbi.

seg.quote: People had told me it was suicide to admit my mistake.
